EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Steam Power Generation System (Boiler Zone)
Consists of:
• A boiler positioned at (8.0, 20.5) featuring connection points at (8.5, 18.5) and (8.5, 22.5), a dedicated steam output at (6.5, 20.5) and, in the latest update, operating with fluid system identifier 56003.
• Steam engines (generators) installed at positions (0.5, 9.5), (18.5, 11.5), (1.5, 13.5), (13.5, 14.5), (19.5, 14.5), (22.5, 18.5), (17.5, 20.5), (12.5, 21.5) and (4.5, 23.5).
• An extra steam engine remains unplaced due to congestion in the boiler zone.

### Automated Mining Setup
Consists of:
• A burner mining drill located at (–15.0, –50.0) for resource extraction.
• Burner inserters positioned at (–14.5, –52.5) and (–13.5, –52.5) – along with additional inserters (e.g. at (–16.5, –48.5)) supporting task coordination.
• A wooden chest placed at (–13.5, –51.5) serving as a buffer for mined resources.

### Smelting Process Cluster
Consists of:
• A stone furnace situated at (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore into iron-plate.
• A stone furnace at (5.0, 0.0) converting copper ore into copper-plate.
• Complementary burner inserters and wooden chests that support the smelting workflow.

### Fluid and Electrical Infrastructure
Consists of:
• An offshore pump at (0.5, 30.5) delivering water to interconnected pipe networks.
• Multiple pipe groups establishing a fluid distribution network (with recent identifiers including 55991, 56001, 56002 and 56006).
• Electricity groups linking distributed power poles.
• Belt groups that interconnect various production and processing sites.

### Research Lab Network
Consists of:
• Lab units configured to conduct automation research and to accept automation‑science‑packs.
• Laboratory components (e.g., units with electrical identifiers such as 14047) that are currently experiencing power connectivity issues.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Extra Steam Engine Placement Issue:
  – The extra steam engine remains unplaceable due to severe spatial congestion in the boiler zone centered at (8.0, 20.5).
  – Overlapping burner inserters and misaligned transport belts—especially near the (8.5, 22.5) connection point—create obstacles for placement.
  – To mitigate, manually remove or reposition conflicting entities, redesign adjacent connection interfaces to enlarge the buildable area, or relocate the extra steam engine to a less congested zone.
